topics.body:
so i was i a family reunion yet again bored out of my mind and we still had to be there like 3 to 4 hours with my mom, my cousin and her mom, so we were having a casual conversation, my mom talking about some shit ass paparazzi doing their thing, and i mentioned kanye west (guy has shorter temper than vegeta) when my cousin said "isnt that the guy married to beyonce and who made songs with jay z" of course i said yes, and i kept talking about him, she then talked about 2pac and biggies, and she even had lots of songs in her phone, talked about ice cube, tyler the creator, shitting on lil wayne and drake, nwa and much much more about rap (she even had a biggieÂ´s shirt) and then soem random shit like drugs and old cartoons.

tl;dr my cousin its pretty cool and made my evening less sufferable.

!http://edge-img.datpiff.com/mfc9e266/Wu_Tang_X_Odd_Future_Wu_Future-front-large.jpg!

topics.body:
I just finished Bioshock Infinite.

Favourite weapon is Hail Fire.
Favourite gear is Fire Bird.
Favourite enemy is the Siren.
Favourite character is Songbird.

Least favourite weapon is the Hand Cannon.
Least favourite gear is Vampire's Embrace.
Least favourite enemy is the Boys of Silence.
Least favourite character is Comstock (and Jeremiah Fink).

The game was insane, loud, chaotic and very confusing.
Overall, it was a great game and I enjoyed it.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
